homeRoute.title: On-Chain
homeRoute.infoPage: Join as an affiliate and earn rewards for every friend you invite that registers and completes KYC on Proton.
homeRoute.modalInfo: Enter your Proton account and e-mail to apply as an affiliate.
homeRoute.referralNotFound: No referral found  for {{ invitee }} or awaiting admin approval , please contact an Admin

body.paragraph1: The Proton Affiliate platform is a fully An on-chain affiliate marketing platform, rewarding users in XPR for referring and registering new users on Proton.

body1.paragraph1: The Proton Affiliate Program is an on-chain affiliate marketing platform that rewards users for referring new users to the Proton Wallet. Affiliates will be able to share a referral link inviting new users, once the invitee creates an account and completes the KYC (Know Your Client) process, both users will receive payment in XPR, Proton’s native token, as a reward.

body2.paragraph1: The Proton Affiliate Program is a straightforward way for you to earn XPR. If you’re a Proton affiliate you can easily send an invitation link through the webapp and have a complete visualization of your referrals. Once a referred person completes the process and becomes a Proton user, you will automatically receive rewards in XPR.

body3.paragraph1: Anyone with a valid and fully registered Proton Wallet account can obtain a referral link. You can apply to become an affiliate on earnproton.com.

body4.paragraph1: The Proton Affiliate Program is funded by allocating network resources and through inflation rewards to fund the protocol development.

body5.paragraph1: The Proton Wallet allows people to safely interact with the Proton blockchain. Account creation is fast and free, and allows you to reserve a unique @name which you will use to receive payments, approve transactions, and verify your identity. Proton wallet users can easily use their account to make cryptocurrency swaps, participate in staking and yield farming, mint and trade NFTs, and more.

body6.paragraph1: Proton is the payments blockchain - programmable money that works. Proton uses a system of human-readable verified @names to approve transactions, receive funds, and ensure the ecosystem stays people-friendly. Capable of up to 4,000 transactions per second, and with zero gas fees, Proton is a simple and accessible way to make cryptocurrency swaps, micro-transactions, NFT trades, and more. Plus, because the Proton blockchain is energy efficient, it drastically cuts down on the carbon footprint of blockchain transactions, offering an ecologically-friendly way to compute financial transactions.

helpRoute.title: Need Help?
helpRoute.paragraph: Get in touch to ask any questions, suggest new features or report bugs.
helpRoute.info1: Take a minute, go to our project Github repository and leave a bug report.
helpRoute.subtitle2: Do you have a question or maybe some feedback?
helpRoute.info2: We value your opinion and want to make sure everything is working properly. Drop by and let us know what’s on your mind.
helpRoute.subtitle3: Want to learn more about Proton?
helpRoute.info3: We value your opinion and want to make sure everything is working properly. Drop by and let us know what’s on your mind.

affiliateRoute.pageInfo: Receive XPR token rewards equal to ${{ reward }} for every person you invite that registers to Proton as a user and completes the KYC within {{ hours }} hours.

joinRoute.title: You’ve Been Invited to Join Proton!
joinRoute.infoPage: You’ve been invited by {{ referrer }} to join the Proton Blockchain. Sign-up now and earn ${{ reward }} in proton cryptocurrency.
joinRoute.step1: Step 1: Select your new Proton username.
joinRoute.step2: Step 2: Download the app, register and KYC.
joinRoute.step2Info: Register using the same username as above.
joinRoute.step4Info: An admin will review your referral and approve your rewards.
joinRoute.info: Your $10 reward its in the way!
joinRoute.info2: Join the referral program, invite friends or family and obtain $10 more for each completed registration.
joinRoute.invalidLink: The link you provided is not a valid referral.
joinRoute.invalidInfo: Please check the link is correct or contact the affiliate that invited you for a valid referral.
